title: Ionic v3 photo capture app
desc: I'm building a Ionic v3 app and I need a freelancer to build a couple of actions:The ideia is to have a mechanic very similar to snapshat/messenger/etc for photo capturing with a image overlay. (One option would be to use transparent png as a image overlay from a json array of remote url images in a slide/swipe like selection)I only need the Ionic project with the respective dependencies, no need to compile the code.I figure we only need about 3 or 4 methods written to make this work, so it is a simple project. No need for design, or other features not mentioned on this description. For the image overlay use any image as example, i will edit them afterwards.Only 2 steps:- While the camera is on the user can swipe to choose a image as a overlay mask before capturing the picture.- After the image is taken, is saved into the device and the native share menu (ios or android) shows up to share the image.In attachment I show the 2 screens as the example of the 1st step and 2nd step.It is important that you only use Angular4 / typescript and Ionic framework v3.Please send me some project you already did in Ionic.I need this done in no more than 2 days.Thank you

title: budget hotel app
desc: I need an Android app that can do the following:1)Able to link sale data from multiple location(branch).2)able to record sales,room reservation,check in and out customer.3)send notification between employee regarding the status of the room and sales.basic info about the app:1)we divide the roles in our company into 4 .-Head manager-Branch manager-receptionist-cleanerhead manager access right :(Full access right)-add/edit employee record **able to asign branch manager.-add/edit customer record-add/edit franchisee record-add/edit room record-add/edit sales record-able to check in check out make reservation and make sales.-view all the reports-able to send and recieve notification to employeeBranch manager access right:Limited access right-add/edit employee record in thier own branch only **unable to asign branch manager.-add/edit customer record-add/edit room record-able to check in check out make reservation and make sales.-add/edit sales record-view all the reports that relate to his own branch only.-able to send and recieve notification to employeereceptionist access right:-add/edit customer record-edit room record-able to check in check out make reservation and make sales.-view sales ,room report (limited)-able to send and recieve notificationCleaner access right:-view room status only(able to send and receive notification of room status and mark the room as done and REQUEST FOR INSPECTION and onve inspected by the receptionist will be mark as CLEAN)check in procedure:-request customer id or passport and search for record-able to add customer on the fly if it is new customer and if the customer is a returning customer then can proceed with the check in .-after the customer has been added or varified need to select the room that the customer will be checking in and select number of days the customer will be staying then collect payment from the [url removed, login to view] will print a receipt to the customer with thermal recipt printer 58mm( link to a cahsdrawer) with the room number and the wifi password.check out procedure:-during cek out we will inspect the room for any damage or any missing items and did the guest smoke in the room and the key has been return or not.-The cleaner will be inspecting the room and notify receptionist. The recptionist will put comment and make a record for the customer .-we will call or sms customer if the key has not been return and remind them to return the key.-after the cleaner done cleaning the cleaner will notify the recpetionist to inspect and double check the room again before the room will be make avalible for rent.Reservation procedure:-we have listed the hotel on [url removed, login to view] and [url removed, login to view] we will record all the upcoming booking into our system manually .-booking over the phone require payment either by cash transfer or by paypal to comfirm the booking.items and services sale:-customer can order snack or drink from our reception which will be pay by cash and send to the room .Reports:-Sale reports-room reports-check in and check out reports-reservation report.-customer reports-employee report.i hope the above info is clear enough just private chat me if need any more info .

title: Android phone as GSM gateway for Asterisk
desc: I need to use an android cellphone as an asterisk channel/Gateway. This will make phone calls using Asterisk PBX through a cellphone running android. In this case, Android phone will be acting as a GSM Gateway for Asterisk.The application working in APK formatFull source codeSimple manual for compiling and generating the application from sourceFeatures :-Route call from SIP to GSM-Convert audio from/to SIP and GSM networks-Able to run on Android 4.0 and up.- Must run on background- Must be very lightweight to run on small memory devicesSip Requirements :- Register on Sip Proxy/Gateway- Receive call authenticated by IP, user/pass or no authentication.- Make calls with or without authentication- Forward DTMF digits using RFC2833 or inband- Use codec G711 and GSM- Be able to use codec G729- Receive through GSM one 1 simultaneous call and rout it to a predefined SIP client- Be able to store a CSV with all calls made

title: Modify iOS and Android App v2b
desc: Modify iOS and Android app and put in App store and Google Play. I am budgetting roughly $450 for this project as I think it is small and most of the components are already in place for iOSI have an existing iOS and Android app. The iOS app is for iPhone and iPad (not wearable); while the Android app is for all Android devices (not wearable) - the Android app may have to be created. I AM LOOKING FOR A DEVELOPER WHO CAN PROGRAM FOR BOTH IOS AND ANDROID. I AM "NOT" LOOKING FOR A TEAM AND SOMEONE WHO WILL FIND A DEVELOPER!Currently, both software use a webview to display content from a remote site; if a certain token is not seen in the url, then a native form is shown where the user has to enter a 16 digit registration key -- once the key is entered, then it will display the designated web content. THIS NEEDS TO CHANGE.What I want to change------------------------------------1. Change the background image of the app (currently water droplets).2. A native device icon appears above the top right section of the webview. Update that icon to receive JSON. If no JSON is received, or if it is empty, hide the icon. If it receives objects, they will determine what links will appear and the left slide bar when the icon is clicked. The links should be native to the device and allow user to set new URL for the webview.3. Put a loading icon, which I will provide in the center-middle of the webview. When the app is started, and the webview is still loading its content, this icon should remain visible.4. Remove the old app registration page where the user enters hexadecimal characters inside fields.6. The JSON that is returned will have information such as the icon, app name, url, etc.7. If the user is not authenticated, and they first open the app, they will be redirected to a login screen. After login, the webview should then disappear and the background image of the app should appear (image for your reference provided).8. App queries api for notifications. If any found, app will use native method to display notification as well as on badge.9. Native login form to authenticate webview with server if possible. If not, then app will display a login page within the webview (this page will come from the web server). Api can return the users profile photo and name for the app to save locally - see photo.10. If user has already authenticated but session expired, app will show profile photo of user as well as name, followed with a password field below - see photo.

title: Create a Fake GPS location app for iOS
desc: Create an iOS (iPhone and iPad) app that allows the user to fake the current GPS location. The user should be able to enter an address as text or set the location on a world map. The location that has been set by the user should automatically be shown in other apps, such as Tinder, which are allowed to receive information about the location.The design can be as simple as possible. Concerning the world map, you can use any third party map application that is free and easy to include.Similar Fake GPS apps exist for Android, but apparently not for iOS.

There will be a traffic page like: ([url removed, login to view]), this page will redirect the traffic by countries (geolocation) and send each traffic country by this rules:- redirect traffic by:visitor - > system check visitor country  -> URL that order this country traffic ->if not found order for this country -> worldwide traffic for "service id X" orders.PopAds API: PopAds API is very simple: If there is an order from the panel, by the service ID the popads API automatic "start" an exist frozen campaign, and it automatic every mlisecond checking how many traffic been sent (traffic states from popads API by the campign report)The system need to count in this way: if order is ordered 1000 traffic the system need to send him x2 traffic (2,000) from his order. after it sent system need to mark this order by done and give the API response back by.and then 'pause' the campaign on popads (its possible on the API)**** THE PANEL NEED BE SAME LIKE THIS API: ***[url removed, login to view]check the API after you register to this website on the menu "API""You can find package_id on Mass Order PageAPI For	Place New OrderEnd Point[url removed, login to view]HTTP MethodPOSTRequired Parametersapi_tokenpackage_idquantitylinkcomments (optional for custom comments only, each separated by '\n', '\n\r')Success Response{"order": 6012}API For	Get Order StatusEnd Point[url removed, login to view]HTTP MethodGETRequired Parametersapi_tokenorderSuccess Response{"status": "Completed","start_counter": "600","remains": "600"}"--------------------------------------------******** [url removed, login to view] API: ***********[url removed, login to view]
